name: Traffic Run
description:
Traffic Run - You drive with the car as fast as possible through the town to the finish.

You need to pay attention to traffic signals and road signs.

For every driving error you get a time penalty.

Accelerate and brake at the right moment and prove that you are going through the route faster than any other.

The fastest 10 drivers will be presented at www.traffic-run.com.

As a bonus, there are 3 mini-games where you can show your reaction and skill.
